00020 #include "MaskROIExtractor.h"
00021 #include "brics_3d/core/Logger.h"
00022 
00023 namespace brics_3d {
00024 
00025 MaskROIExtractor::MaskROIExtractor() {
00026         mask = 0;
00027         useInvertedMask = false;
00028 }
00029 
00030 MaskROIExtractor::~MaskROIExtractor() {
00031         if (mask) {
00032                 //delete mask;
00033                 mask = 0;
00034         }
00035 }
00036 
00037 void MaskROIExtractor::filter(PointCloud3D* originalPointCloud, PointCloud3D* resultPointCloud) {
00038         assert (mask != 0);
00039         if(useInvertedMask) {
00040                 extractNonIndexedPointCloud(originalPointCloud, *mask, resultPointCloud);
00041         } else {
00042                 extractIndexedPointCloud(originalPointCloud, *mask, resultPointCloud);
00043         }
00044 }
00045 
00046 void MaskROIExtractor::extractIndexedPointCloud(brics_3d::PointCloud3D* inputPoinCloud, std::vector<int> inliers, brics_3d::PointCloud3D* outputPointCloud) {
00047         assert(inputPoinCloud !=0);
00048         assert(outputPointCloud !=0);
00049 
00050         (*outputPointCloud->getPointCloud()).resize(inliers.size());
00051         //copy over inliers
00052         for (int i = 0; i < static_cast<int>(inliers.size()); ++i) {
00053                 (*outputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i] = (*inputPoinCloud->getPointCloud())[inliers[i]];
00054         }
00055 }
00056 
00057 void MaskROIExtractor::extractNonIndexedPointCloud(brics_3d::PointCloud3D* inputPoinCloud, std::vector<int> inliers, brics_3d::PointCloud3D* outputPointCloud) {
00058         assert(inputPoinCloud !=0);
00059         assert(outputPointCloud !=0);
00060         std::vector<int> invertedInliers;
00061 
00062         outputPointCloud->getPointCloud()->clear();
00063 
00064         if(inliers.size() == inputPoinCloud->getSize()) {
00065                 return; //Nothing to do...
00066         }
00067 
00068         int indliersIndex = 0;
00069         int invertedIndliersIndex = 0;
00070         std::sort(inliers.begin(), inliers.end());
00071         invertedInliers.resize(inputPoinCloud->getSize()-inliers.size());
00072         invertedInliers[invertedInliers.size()-1] = -1;
00073         for (int i = 0; i < static_cast<int>(inputPoinCloud->getSize()); ++i) { // run ofer all input data and skip those that belong to inliers
00074                 if (i == inliers[indliersIndex]) {
00075                         indliersIndex++;
00076                         continue; // skip insertion
00077                 }
00078                 invertedInliers[invertedIndliersIndex] = i;
00079                 invertedIndliersIndex++;
00080         }
00081         assert( invertedInliers[invertedInliers.size()-1] > 0);
00082 //              assert(invertedInliers.size() == inputPoinCloud->getSize());
00083 
00084 
00085 //              for (int i = 0; i < static_cast<int>(inliers.size()); ++i) {
00086 //                      invertedInliers.erase(invertedInliers.begin() + inliers[i]);
00087 //              }
00088         LOG(DEBUG) << "inliers.size(), invertedInliers.size(), inputPoinCloud->getSize()" << inliers.size() << ", " << invertedInliers.size() << ", " << inputPoinCloud->getSize();
00089         assert(inliers.size() + invertedInliers.size() == inputPoinCloud->getSize());
00090         extractIndexedPointCloud(inputPoinCloud, invertedInliers, outputPointCloud);
00091 }
00092 
00093 void MaskROIExtractor::setMask(std::vector<int>* mask) {
00094         assert(mask != 0);
00095         this->mask = mask;
00096 }
00097 
00098 void MaskROIExtractor::setUseInvertedMask(bool useInvertedMask) {
00099         this->useInvertedMask = useInvertedMask;
00100 }
00101 
00102 bool MaskROIExtractor::getUseInvertedMask() {
00103         return this->useInvertedMask;
00104 }
